(numRXQEntries, power_pad).explanation: Increasing the number of receive queue entries requires additional hardware structures and interconnections, which directly increases the pad power consumption needed for external signal driving;

(numRXQEntries, power_switching).explanation: More receive queue entries mean more transistors and logic gates that switch during operation, directly increasing the dynamic switching power consumption;

(numRXQEntries, time).explanation: Additional receive queue entries increase the complexity of hardware implementation and routing, which directly affects the critical path timing and overall execution time;
